traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If Bak Mei fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Bak Mei carries a {@item staff of striking} with 10 charges.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While Bak Mei is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Bak Mei attacks three times: twice with Thunder Strike and once with his staff of striking.

actions.name: Thunder Strike
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) thunder damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition deafened} and {@condition stunned} until the start of Bak Mei's next turn.

actions.name: Staff of Striking
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6 damage) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8 damage) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, and Bak Mei can expend up to 3 of the staff's charges. For each expended charge, the target takes an extra 1d6 damage force damage.

actions.name: Heal Self (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Bak Mei regains {@dice 2d8 + 4} hit points, and all levels of {@condition exhaustion} end on him.

legendary.name: Crane Dance
entries: Bak Mei moves up to 20 feet. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.
